description:
In this course titled ' NLP- Get Rid Of Self Sabotage And Become Successful In Life ' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn many NLP and Self Hypnosis techniques to avoid self destruction or self sabotage yourself in pressurizing situation and challenges in life .

By taking this course you will be able to identify many reason as to why you would sabotage and how to get rid of self sabotage and boost your confidence and morale in challenging situations of your life .

Using NLP anchoring and visualization techniques you will be able to become more successful in life and achieve your goals faster and effectively .

This course contains more than 30 minutes of video content designed over 9 lectures

This course contains -

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Identify If You Have Self Sabotage

Lecture3:Reasons Why People Have Self Sabotage Top 3 Reasons

Lecture 4: What Is The Benefit Of Change?

Lecture5:Identify If You Have Fear Of Success

Lecture6:Create An NLP Anchor For Motivation

Lecture7:How To Get Rid Of Self Sabotage Using Visualization

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise - Relaxation Technique Using Self Hypnosis

Lecture9:Summary
title: NLP- Get Rid Of Self Sabotage And Become Successful In Life
